item.title: First Post
item.description: Just creating this blog. It’s 100% a copy of: https://github.com/arran4/githubpages But I will add stuff to it. I intend to use this space to post more technical things. Probably just tech related complaints that are more wordy than Twitter will allow. On the plus side it’s all managed by hugo!
